resources.string: "Sign in to Banana Browser"
"Sync your Banana Browser data"
"Help improve Banana Browser\'s features and performance"
"Copied to Banana Browser"
"Export passwords stored with Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser Passwords"
"Help improve Banana Browser security"
"To detect dangerous apps and sites, Banana Browser sends URLs of some pages you visit, limited system information, and some page content to Google"
"Cleared Banana Browser data"

"The selected data has been removed from Banana Browser and your synced devices.
Your Google account may have other forms of browsing history like searches and activity from other Google services at <link>myactivity.google.com</link>."
"Turn on permissions for Banana Browser in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"Turn on permission for Banana Browser in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"To let Banana Browser access your location, also turn on location in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"To let Banana Browser access your camera, also turn on camera in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"To let Banana Browser send you notifications, also turn on notifications in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"To let Banana Browser access your microphone, also turn on microphone in <link>Android Settings</link>."
"In Lite mode, Banana Browser loads pages faster and uses up to 60 percent less data."
"When Lite mode is on, Banana Browser uses Google servers to make pages load faster. Lite mode rewrites very slow pages to load only essential content. Lite mode does not apply to Incognito tabs."
"In Lite mode, Banana Browser loads pages faster and uses up to 60 percent less data. To optimize the pages that you visit, Banana Browser sends your web traffic to Google. <link>Learn more</link>"
"Banana Browser has saved you %1$d MB"
"Banana Browser has saved you %1$d GB"
"About Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser updates are no longer supported for this version of Android"
"Sign out of Banana Browser"
"Powered by Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser Terms of Service"
"Banana Browser Privacy Notice"
"Clear your Banana Browser data from this device?"
"Your bookmarks, history, passwords, and other Banana Browser data will no longer be synced to your Google Account"
"Also clear your Banana Browser data from this device"
"Because you\'re signing out of an account managed by %1$s, your Banana Browser data will be deleted from this device. It will remain in your Google Account."

"You are signing in with an account managed by %1$s and giving its administrator control over your Banana Browser data. Your data will become permanently tied to this account. Signing out of Banana Browser will delete your data from this device, but it will remain stored in your Google Account."
"Tabs that you\'ve opened in Banana Browser on your other devices will appear here."
"Banana Browser is unable to turn on Bluetooth adapter"
"Banana Browser needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>"
"Banana Browser needs location access to scan for devices. Location access is <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Banana Browser needs location access to scan for devices. <permission_link>Update permissions</permission_link>. Location access is also <services_link>turned off for this device</services_link>."
"Open Android settings and re-enable Android system sync to start Banana Browser sync"
"To start sync, turn on \"Sync your Banana Browser data\"."
"Restart Banana Browser"
"Downloading Banana Browser Update…"
"Update Banana Browser"
"For the best browsing experience, open to update Banana Browser"
"Update Banana Browser"
"To see the web in your language, get the latest version of Banana Browser"
"Update to get your language in the latest version of Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser needs permission to access your camera for this site."
"Banana Browser needs permission to access your microphone for this site."
"Banana Browser needs permission to access your camera and microphone for this site."
"Banana Browser needs access to your location to share your location with this site."
"Banana Browser needs storage access to download files."
"Open in new Banana Browser tab"
"Banana Browser First Run Experience"
"By using this application, you agree to Banana Browser’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>."

"By using this application, you agree to Banana Browser’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>, and the <LINK3>Privacy Notice for Google Accounts Managed with Family Link</LINK3>."
"%1$s will open in Banana Browser. By continuing, you agree to Banana Browser’s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>."

"%1$s will open in Banana Browser. By continuing, you agree to Banana Browser\'s <LINK1>Terms of Service</LINK1> and <LINK2>Privacy Notice</LINK2>, and the <LINK3>Privacy Notice for Google Accounts Managed with Family Link</LINK3>."
"Help make Banana Browser better by sending usage statistics and crash reports to Google."
"Welcome to Banana Browser"
"Update Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser can’t update"
"Restart Banana Browser"
"Open in Banana Browser"
"Open in Incognito Banana Browser"
"Help improve Banana Browser. <LINK>Take survey</LINK>"
"Banana Browser can’t update. More options"
"Unsupported number of Banana Browser instances."
"Site storage Banana Browser doesn\'t think is important (e.g. sites with no saved settings or that you don\'t visit often)"
"This will clear cookies, cache, and other data of sites Banana Browser doesn\'t think is important."
"Total data used by Banana Browser, including accounts, bookmarks, and saved settings"
"All Banana Browser’s app data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc."
"Banana Browser can use Sogou for search in China. You can change this in Settings."
"This app is running in Banana Browser"
"Running in Banana Browser"
"%1$s also has data in Banana Browser"
"You can clear the data in Banana Browser Settings"
"Open the Banana Browser Help Center in a new tab"
"Google Banana Browser feature shortcuts"
"Banana Browser is still preparing for VR. Restart Banana Browser later."
"Reopen Banana Browser."
"Installing %1$s for Banana Browser…"
"Unable to install %1$s for Banana Browser"
"Banana Browser now downloads files faster"
"To share something from your phone to another device, turn on sync in Banana Browser settings on both devices"
"Go to Banana Browser settings"
"Make sure %1$s has sync turned on in Banana Browser"
"This page uses too much memory, so Banana Browser paused it."
"This page uses too much memory, so Banana Browser removed some content."
"Google Assistant in Banana Browser"
"Show your Banana Browser activity in Digital Wellbeing?"

"You can see sites you visit in Banana Browser and set timers for them.\n\nGoogle gets info about the sites you set timers for and how long you visit them. This info is used to make Digital Wellbeing better."
"Remove your Banana Browser activity from Digital Wellbeing"
"Remove your Banana Browser activity from Digital Wellbeing?"
"Sites you visit in Banana Browser won\'t show. All site timers will be deleted."
"Google Assistant in Banana Browser"
